item.title: Building docker images with KIWI
item.description: I’m pleased to announce Marcus Sch√§fer has just made possible to build docker images with KIWI. For those who never heard about it, KIWI is a tool which creates Linux systems for both physical and virtual machines. It can create openSUSE, SUSE and other types of Linux distributions. Update: I changed the required version of kiwi and the openSUSE 13.1 template. Kiwi just received some improvements which do no longer force the image to include the lxc package.
